mcq1.question: Who was born in ulm, germany?

quiz.summary: Albert einstein was born at ulm, in w√ºrttemberg, germany, on march 14, 1879. he later moved to aarau, italy and continued his education at the gymnasium of the luitpold in the city of luton, swissylvania, before becoming an engineer in 1905 and completing his doctorate in 1906 - but was unable to find teaching post despite being offered the presidency of state of germany in 1933 'for political
